section.title: Description
section.p: Calculates the best available approximation of the cumulative amount of time used by your program since it started. To convert the result into seconds, divide by the macro CLOCKS_PER_SEC.

section.title: Returns
section.p: The amount of processor time used so far by your program, in units defined by the machine-dependent macro CLOCKS_PER_SEC. If no measurement is available, the result is -1.
